dcterms:description: A dataset for markerless capture of hand pose and shape from single RGB images, containing real-captured images with various hand poses associated with their key point coordinate annotations.
dcterms:title: FreiHand

dcterms:creator: T. Simon
A. A. D. M. M. A. M. K. Lim
dcterms:description: A dataset for hand keypoint detection in single images using multiview bootstrapping, containing real-captured images with various hand poses associated with their key point coordinate annotations.
dcterms:title: CMU Panoptic Hand
